content: notes - finished size as written is approximately 25 x32 additional repeats of the pattern can be added in both length and width to change the final dimensions - lace pattern is a multiple of 10 if you desire the blanket to be narrower or wider subtract or add multiples of 10 to the cast on - the lace pattern has a total of 32 row with 4 distinct sub-sections if terminating the lace section before reaching the 32nd row in the pattern i recommend stopping after row 8 16 or 24 to complete the motif - the border is 10 stitches wide plus one extra slip_stitch for a selvedge if making the border wider you may need to add a few extra row of moss stitch at the top and bottom to ensure the borders are the same width
